pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatio-Temporal; Inverse Distance Weighting and Radial Basis Functions with Distance-Based Regression // Spatio-temporal: Inverse Distance Weighting (IDW) and radial basis functions; optimization, prediction, summary statistics from leave-one-out cross-validation, adjusting distance-based linear regression model and generation of the principal coordinates of a new individual from Gower's distance.
